summary: Provides 40 fully configurable extra hotkeys that can be used to equip weapons, shields, spells, armor, items or shouts.  Items can be assigned in-game.  Also provides a few new controls for combat and item interaction.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://SkyrimGEMS.com][img]http://SkyrimGEMS.com/images/badge_animated.gif[/img][/url]
[size=4][b](Category: 120 - UI - Timesavers )[/b][/size][/center]

The primary function of this script is to add more hotkeys for equipment, spells, and shouts.
The new hotkeys include these keys by default:  F1-F10 9 0 - = [ ] \\ ; \' /

You can also combine a hotkey with the Modifier Keys (Left and right Alt) to access extra sets of hotkeys.

Now includes left-hand weapon and right-hand spell keybinding!

Consult the readme to learn how to assign hotkeys in-game!

[u]-New Functions-[/u]
Here are some new controls:
	
X - unequip item
Alt+X - drop equipped item
Alt+X while grabbing an item - equip / use grabbed item
Alt+X while grabbing an corpse - throw corpse forward
Hold B- unequips left hand while B is held

All these keys can be changed by editing the extraHotkeys.ini file.  Instructions on how to do so are found in extraHotkeys.ini.

[u]-Known Issues-[/u]
Armor equipped from a hotkey does not have its enchantments applied to the player.
Torches cannot be dropped.

[u]-Requirements-[/u]
Requires Script Dragon, found here: http://alexander.sannybuilder.com/?category=other&altname=skyrim_script_dragon

[u]-Installation-[/u]
1. Install Script Dragon from the above link.
2. Place extraHotkeys.asi and extraHotkeys.ini into your root Skyrim folder, alongside TESV.exe. NOT the Data folder, and NOT the asi folder.
3. You\'re done!  If installation was successful, when you load your saved game, \"[Extra Hotkeys] active\" will appear in the top left of your screen.

[u]-Uninstalling-[/u]
Delete extraHotkeys.asi and extraHotkeys.ini.

[u]-Changelog-[/u]
2.1.3 - updated to work with Skyrim 1.4.  (REQUIRES SCRIPT DRAGON v1.4.21.2)  Hasn\'t been thoroughly tested but appears to work.
2.1.2 - fixed bow charge drain glitch.
2.1.1 - allows torches to be hotkeyed / unequipped.

[u]-Credit-[/u]
Thanks to Alexander Blade for Script Dragon, and to taewon and NullCascade for additional code knowledge.

------

Source files are available in the download section!  Feel free to modify or redistribute Extra Hotkeys -- but please give credit!  Also, if you make any changes, please note clearly to your downloaders what you have modified from the original.
author: Eldiran

files.name: Extra Hotkeys v2-1
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed enchantment drain bug
Fixed Alt+X corpse pick up bug; replaced with ability to throw corpses
Added extra modifier key
Added key to equip both modifier hotkeys at once
